title: Want to trade these for T206 beaters
author: Tao_Moko

posts.post_title: Want to trade these for T206 beaters
posts.post_content:
Instead of sell for nothing I'm going to see if anyone wants to trade for lower grade T206 cards.  My estimated trade value is listed below

T207
Mcintire - $22 *factory606
Lennox - SOLD
Reulbach - $15 (paperloss)
T206
Pfeister - $20 *sc150/25
Kling - $25 *pd350/25
Dougherty - SOLD
T205
Archer - $22 *polar bear
Foxen - $25 *pd25
Kroh - $26 *pd25
Moran - $25 *Honest
Needham - $20 *pb
Pfeister -$21 *SC(black)42
Sheckard - $20 *pd25
Sheckard - $23 *Hassan
Reulbach - $15 *pd25 (paperloss)
Richie - $22 *pb
Schulte - $13 *pd25 (paperloss)
Misc(Sporting News, Domino and P2
Schulte - $17 (trimmed)
Reulbach - $20 
Needham -SOLD
One last day before they go to the local shop.
